introduction: Itinerary for a 4-Day Trip to London

timeOfDay.description: Start your day with a visit to the South Bank, a cultural hub where you can enjoy performances at the Southbank Centre and admire the view of the London Eye and Houses of Parliament.
Explore the Thames path and cycle along the canals that meander through the city, immersing yourself in the vibrant outdoor atmosphere of London.
Indulge in a leisurely evening by the river, sipping drinks and soaking in the bustling ambiance of the South Bank.
Visit the French Huguenots' historic area at Spitalelds to delve into London's immigrant history and experience the creative charm of the 17th century.
Immerse yourself in the literary culture of London at a market dedicated to the written word, exploring the diverse offerings and unique finds.
Relax and unwind in the cultural tapestry of London, reflecting on the day's discoveries and planning for more adventures ahead.
